sentences.en: a clear but polite request
sentences.cn: 明确但客气的请求

sentences.en: Cross cleared his throat and spoke in low, polite tones.
sentences.cn: 克罗斯清了清嗓子，开始有礼貌地低声说话。

sentences.en: Everyone around him was trying to be polite, but you could tell they were all bored.
sentences.cn: 他身边的每一个人都尽力表现得彬彬有礼，但你可以看出他们都厌倦了。

sentences.en: Gonzales, a quiet and very polite young man, made a favourable impression.
sentences.cn: 冈萨雷斯是个文静而又很有礼貌的年轻人，给人留下了很好的印象。

sentences.en: He was always so polite and respectful.
sentences.cn: 他总是彬彬有礼，尊敬他人。

sentences.en: He was unfailingly polite to customers.
sentences.cn: 他对顾客总是以礼相待。

sentences.en: He's a man of few words, very polite and unassuming.
sentences.cn: 他话不多，很有礼貌，为人谦和。

sentences.en: He's generous and, you know, very nice, very polite.
sentences.cn: 他很大方而且，你知道，很友善，很有礼貌。

sentences.en: I hate having to make polite conversation.
sentences.cn: 我很讨厌不得不说些应酬话。

sentences.en: I think English men are very polite and very correct.
sentences.cn: 我认为英国人很有礼貌，举止非常得体。

sentences.en: It’s not polite to talk with your mouth full.
sentences.cn: 满嘴食物时讲话是不礼貌的。

sentences.en: Please be polite to our guests.
sentences.cn: 请礼貌待客。

sentences.en: polite, well-behaved children
sentences.cn: 懂礼貌、守规矩的孩子

sentences.en: She is always polite and considerate towards her employees.
sentences.cn: 她对待雇员总是客客气气，关心体谅。

sentences.en: She’s always very polite.
sentences.cn: 她总是很有礼貌。

sentences.en: The prison official is icily polite and bureaucratic.
sentences.cn: 监狱官冷淡又客气，表现出十足的官僚作风。

sentences.en: The tone of his language was diplomatic and polite.
sentences.cn: 他说话圆通得体、彬彬有礼。

sentences.en: They are always perfectly polite and beautifully mannered.
sentences.cn: 他们总是很懂礼貌，彬彬有礼。

sentences.en: They were very polite, I must confess.
sentences.cn: 我得承认他们很有礼貌。

sentences.en: We made polite, stilted conversation.
sentences.cn: 我们客套了一番。

sentences.en: Well-dressed clients were talking in polite undertones as they ate.
sentences.cn: 衣着光鲜的顾客们边吃边斯文地低声聊着天。
